title: New York Types Article
content:
NY Times actually, lol, I dare you not to read an article titled "A Subway Typeface History" that includes the quote: ..."a battlefield filled with typographers and color-experts locked in mortal combat." Ahhh, the splackle of clashing color swatches and pica rules in the morning.

Cheers!
author: bbg

comments.content: I stopped reading that paper after they gave Kristol a column. If that wasn’t a giant red flag that says “our editors just don’t care anymore” I don’t know what is.

Surfing on the East River with rounds of live Letters whizzing past your ears.

ChrisL

Jennifer 8. Lee?

maybe she \*really\* liked that Andy Garcia movie?
